title: I don't know you people
body: Hardly anyone I know uses boards, who are all these other people? Where did they come from?

replies.body:
You should get to know me.
Intimately.

> I use boards. you know me.
> fgt.

yes we do
I came from Gallifrey if that helps.
Nobody likes me. :({{champion:103}}  Don't you remember me?
rbownslsh pls u know us all
